title: MD
biography: Jens Juul Holst is a Danish physician and physiologist. He is known for discovering and describing the hormone glucagon-like peptide-1 (GLP-1), a hormone in the gut that plays an important role in the onset and development of Type 2 diabetes. In collaboration with researcher and author Arne Astrup, he discovered that GLP-1 acts as a satiety hormone in humans.
aiSummary: Jens J. Holst is a incretin hormones specialist with an H-index of 193 at University of Copenhagen (Faculty). Has been published in Nature Reviews Disease Primers, The Lancet, New England Journal of Medicine. Based in Denmark.
